Pairs domain models

Character

The character model.

PROPERTYTYPEDESCRIPTION
idstringThe id of the character
namestringThe name of the character
positionCharPositionThe position of the character
keysLevelKeyCollectionThe keys which the character has at the moment
historiesLevelHistoryCollectionThe histories of the levels in the current floor
playingStatePlayingStateThe playing state of the last level
locksLevelLockCollectionThe locks statuses of the levels in the current floor

CharacterPosition

The position model

PROPERTYTYPEDESCRIPTION
floorIdstringThe floor id of the position
floorObjectIdstringThe floor object id of the position

LevelHistory

The history of the level.

PROPERTYTYPEDESCRIPTION
levelIdstringThe level id of the history
scorestringThe high score of the level
clearedbooleanTrue iff the level is cleared
clearedAtstringThe time when the level is cleared

LevelKey

The key for unlocking the next level. Typically the character gets the key when he/she clears a level.

PROPERTYTYPEDESCRIPTION
levelIdstringThe id of the level

LevelLock

The lock of the level.

PROPERTYTYPEDESCRIPTION
levelIdstringThe level id
lockedbooleanTrue iff the level is locked

PlayingState

The playing state of the level of the character

PROPERTYTYPEDESCRIPTION
charIdstringThe id of the character
levelIdstringThe id of the level
roundsstring[][]The playing round data

User

The user model.

PROPERTYTYPEDESCRIPTION
charIdstringThe id of the character currently chosen
statUserStatisticsThe statisctics of the user activity

UserStatistics

The statistics of the user activities.

PROPERTYTYPEDESCRIPTION
launchTimesnumberThe number of times when the app is launched
